history.content:
Critical Making for Spring 2018

http://make.berkeley.edu

Important Enrollment Info for Spring 2018

All students will be waitlisted prior to the start of the course. Enrollment from the waitlist for Critical Making is based on an application the instructor will distribute prior to the end of the Fall 2017 semester. Enrollment will not be based on waitlist order but you must be on the waitlist by 4 Dec 2017 to be considered for admission to the course. Please put yourself on the waitlist or you will not receive the email that will instruct you to complete the enrollment form by 4 Dec 2017. Do not use Phase 1 TeleBears as your position on the waitlist will not matter. But you must be on the waitlist by 4 Dec 2017. All enrollment decisions will be made before the end of the Fall semester (15 Dec 2017).

Critical making is a New Media course (NWMEDIA 203) but counts as CS technical elective.

Waitlist for the NWMEDIA 203 course. The MECENG C205 listing is only for selected ME MEng students.

Critical Making is a graduate level class.  However, advanced undergraduates are encouraged to apply for enrollment.  As an undergraduate you will not be able to directly place yourself on the waitlist.  However, undergraduates can be added to the waitlist directly by Lara Wolfe (lara@berkeley.edu) Please contact Lara directly if you are an undergraduate and wish to be waitlisted.
history.subject: Critical Making • Spring 2018 Enrollment Information
